ygData.subject: RE: Psalm of Warmth stacking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, it puts up a damage shield - it damages anything that hits you.  The Psalm songs also seem to have full effect when sung, unlike the Rhythm songs
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 30 Jul 1999, Chris Kuenster (Entex) wrote:
>
> I'm sorry if I am being obtuse here but, isnt this just a protective song?
> What do you mean it does damage? Is it like a fire shield? I just got Psalm
> of Cooling and it raises protection from heat by 50-60 points, are you
> saying Psalm of warmth protects from cold as well as causes damage to mobs?
> I have never read this anywhere before.

Yes, it puts up a damage shield - it damages anything that
hits you. The Psalm songs also seem to have full effect when
sung, unlike the Rhythm songs which need a drum for full
effect.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
